heading: HR01468
0: A RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE APPROPRIATE HOUSE COMMITTEE TO INVESTIGATE, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, THE CONTINUED PROLIFERATION OF ILLEGAL DRUGS IN OUR CORRECTIONAL FACILITIES AS WELL AS TO  IDENTIFY GOVERNMENT OFFICIALS AND/OR EMPLOYEES INVOLVED IN THE ILLEGAL DRUG TRADE WITH THE END IN VIEW OF PROPOSING LEGISLATIVE MEASURES TO ARREST THE SAME FROM RECURRING
status: Pending with the Committee on DANGEROUS DRUGS since 2017-12-06
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR01468
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE APPROPRIATE HOUSE COMMITTEE TO INVESTIGATE, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, THE CONTINUED PROLIFERATION OF ILLEGAL DRUGS IN OUR CORRECTIONAL FACILITIES AS WELL AS TO IDENTIFY GOVERNMENT OFFICIALS AND/OR EMPLOYEES INVOLVED IN THE ILLEGAL DRUG TRADE WITH THE END IN VIEW OF PROPOSING LEGISLATIVE MEASURES TO ARREST THE SAME FROM RECURRING
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ALEJANO, GARY C.
DATE FILED : 2017-11-22
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON DANGEROUS DRUGS ON 2017-12-06
PREVIOUS COMMITTEE REFERRALS :PRIMARILY REFERRED TO RULES on 2017-11-22;
